briefdescription.para: Material to use as a base for the text material(s).
Custom world transform for facing the camera automatically.
Text rotation mode in relation to the camera.
Minimal angle between text normal and look-at direction.
Flag for whether currently using SDF shader defines in the generated material.
Apply attribute changes that can not be applied immediately.
Calculate distance and prepare batches for rendering. May be called from worker thread(s), possibly re-entrantly.
Prepare geometry for rendering. Called from a worker thread if possible (no GPU update).
Return whether a geometry update is necessary, and if it can happen in a worker thread.
Set font by looking from resource cache by name and font size. Return true if successful.
Set font and font size. Return true if successful.

detaileddescription.para: Set font size only while retaining the existing font. Return true if successful. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set text. Text is assumed to be either ASCII or UTF8-encoded. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set row spacing, 1.0 for original font spacing. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set wordwrap. In wordwrap mode the text element will respect its current width. Otherwise it resizes itself freely. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set stroke rounding. Corners of the font will be rounded off in the stroke so the stroke won't have corners. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set text width. Only has effect in word wrap mode. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set color on all corners. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set color on one corner. BIND_AS_ALIAS_set_colors
Set whether text has fixed size on screen (pixel-perfect) regardless of distance to camera. Works best when combined with face camera rotation. Default false. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set how the text should rotate in relation to the camera. Default is to not rotate (FC_NONE). BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return width of row by index. BIND_AS_ALIAS_get_rowWidths
Return position of character by index relative to the text element origin. BIND_AS_ALIAS_get_charPositions
Return size of character by index. BIND_AS_ALIAS_get_charSizes
Return whether text has fixed screen size. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return how the text rotates in relation to the camera. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Get color attribute. Uses just the top-left color.

detaileddescription.para: Register object factory. Drawable must be registered first. NO_BIND

briefdescription.para: Create materials for text rendering. May only be called from the main thread. Text UI batches must be up-to-date.
Recalculate camera facing and fixed screen size.
